price: تر دې چې موږ څه وركړي د هغو نا شكري وكړي او خوندونه دې واخلي نو زر به وپوهيږي.
arabic: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلِيَتَمَتَّعُواْۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum waliyatamattaʿū fasawfa yaʿlamūna
